data.message: Hey Facebook what is up with the new messenger app I heard it is really bad and you guys can have access too our phones. Why would you guys would wanna do such a thing and you guys are making us download it but I think you should have a choice.

replies.message: Hi Michael. We know there's been a lot of false (and scary) information going around about app permissions. Learn more about how the Messenger app uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/1qipTI7. -Natalie
It's not false- I have already had 2 messages from friends who were hacked. Enough to warn me NOT to install it!
Still why can't we have a choice.

even if the "scary" stuff isn't true - which it is - asking us to use a second app takes up space on our phones, causes us to bounce between two apps, not helpful and from everyone I know who has been forced to download it and did, they deleted it pretty quickly because it gave them problems.  Asking us to use two apps is not acceptable - fix your issues, listen to the people who use your service because you don't want the users to scream too much or your stock price will go down!
Facebook was pretty easy to hack to begin with you've just made it easier.
